<article style=""><h1>Bitcoin Bail-Ins and Yuan Bets</h1><p>Bitfinex is a bitcoin exchange that suffered a $71 million hacking attack. It is not, to put it gently, the first bitcoin exchange to get hacked. Historically, the way bitcoin-exchange hacks work is that the exchange keeps all of its customers' bitcoins in a single commingled bitcoin wallet, the hackers steal bitcoins from the wallet, and the exchange then passes those losses on to its customers with a mumbled apology.</p><img src="http://assets.bwbx.io/images/iOfaDpZSNRPM/v1/120x120.jpg" /></article>
